snippet:
User Story ID: US-09
Title: Login to account
Story: As a returning user, I want to login so I can view my account and order history.
Acceptance Criteria:
- Login form accepts valid credentials.
- Invalid login shows error message.
- Successful login redirects to My Account dashboard.

ID: US-20
Title: Log out from account
User Story: As a user, I want to log out securely when done with my session.
Acceptance Criteria:
- Logout link is available in header or account menu.
- Clicking it ends the session.
- User is redirected to the home page.

User Story ID: US-18
Title: Update account details
Story: As a logged-in user, I want to update my account information when needed.
Acceptance Criteria:
- My Account includes an edit option.
- User can modify name, email, phone.
- Changes are saved after validation.

User Story ID: US-11
Title: Sort products on category page
Story: As a user, I want to sort products by price or name so that I can easily compare options.
Acceptance Criteria:
- Sort dropdown is available on category pages.
- User can sort by 'Price: Low to High', 'Name A-Z', etc.
- Product list updates accordingly after sorting.

ID: US-01
Title: Browse product categories
User Story: As a user, I want to browse categories so that I can find products of interest.
Acceptance Criteria:
- Category menu is visible in the top navigation.
- Clicking a category navigates to a filtered product listing.
- Product listings match the selected category.

ID: US-07
Title: Guest checkout
User Story: As a guest, I want to checkout without creating an account.
Acceptance Criteria:
- Guest checkout form collects full billing/shipping info.
- All required fields are validated.
- User is able to place an order without logging in.
